name: Karlson Graphics Overhaul
description:
I took Karlson improved the graphics added a bonus level and uh.

thats about it...

Seriously though i spent a long time making this i used multiple tools in order to edit the karlson src.

if you find any bugs please comment and ill update the game if i have time.

Dani (or someone who works with/for him) if you'd like this taken down please email me, or say in the comments below and ill give you my email.
